label: AB3_tP40_127_di_cg2ij-001
title: $\kappa$-AlF$_{3}$ Structure
comments: AlF$_{3}$ has a variety of polymorphs (Le Bail, 2006) including: \begin{itemize} \item $\alpha$-AlF$_{3}$, which takes the \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_hR8_167_e_b-001}{rhombohedral FeF$_{3}$ ($D0_{12}$)} structure. \item $\beta$-AlF$_{3}$ has a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_oC48_63_ad_cfgh-001}{body-centered orthorhombic structure}. \item $\eta$-AlF$_{3}$ has the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_cF64_227_c_f-001}{$\beta$-AlH$_{3}$ structure}. \item $\kappa$-AlF$_{3}$ is this \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_tP40_127_di_cg2ij-001}{tetragonal structure}. \item $\theta$-AlF$_{3}$, also known as $\tau$-AlF$_{3}$, is a \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3_tP64_129_2cdi_2cfhijk-001}{larger tetragonal structure}. \item Above 713K AlF$_{3}$ transforms into the cubic \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B_cP4_221_c_b-001}{ReO$_{3}$ ($D0_{9}$) structure} (Morelock, 2014). \end{itemize}
